stimulusHtml: Which of the following is a testable hypothesis using operational definitions about people who have undergone split-brain surgery to help control severe epilepsy?
choicesHtml: Split-brain patients will not be able to name an object placed in their left visual field.
Split-brain patients will no longer appreciate art following the surgery.
Split-brain patients will have very vivid dreams following the surgery.
Split-brain patients will be more amused by jokes following the surgery.
